10: Higher state
10_s0: Start state
10_s1: Higher state: start
10_s2: Higher-level state: setting_initial lock disabled
10_s2_e0: [Operation] Lock list
10_s3: Waiting for startup: Branch __ distance ON: sound OFF: visibility OFF
10_s4: Top: invisibility setting
10_s4_w0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s5: Startup animation release setting_Lockable setting_SubState
10_s5_e0: [General] Logic group flag setting
10_s6: [LIB] General-purpose: Lower-level switching after the end of initial operation_SubState
10_s7: [LIB] General-purpose: Upper (normal) _SubState
10_s8: First Contact Behavior_Ambush_SubState
10_s9: [LIB] Lower state map switch_SubState
10_s9_e0: [General] Logic group flag setting
10_s9_e1: [General] Logic group flag setting
10_s9_w0: [Action] Cancel activation state
10_s10: [LIB] General-purpose: Top (Normal) _Invisible_SubState
x12: Startup animation release setting_Lockable setting
x12_s0: Start state
x12_s1: Activation animation cancellation: Activation animation judgment
x12_s1_e0: [Action] Cancel activation state
x12_s1_e1: [Operation] Lock list
x12_s2: Start animation cancellation: Start state setting
x12_s2_e0: [Search] Overwrite the generator position with the current position
x12_s3: Start animation cancellation: Start
x12_s4: End state
x13: First contact action_surprise
x13_s0: Start state
x13_s1: Upper logic: FC start
x13_s1_e0: [General] lower-level state map switching
x13_s1_e1: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
x13_s2: Upper logic: waiting for FC
x13_s3: End state
x0: [LIB] General-purpose: upper (normal)
x0_p0: Sound tracking switch
x0_p1: Maximum search distance
x0_p2: Search priority
x0_s0: Start state
x0_s1: Top: Start setting
x0_s1_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
x0_s1_e1: [Movement] Movement prediction accuracy setting

x0_s2: Top: Behavior branch
